mapper.select: SELECT dept.co_cd, dept.dept_cd, dept.dept_st, dept.dept_nm, dept.dept_tr, dept.dept_addr1, dept.dept_addr2, dept.dept_fg FROM sdept AS dept
SELECT dept.co_cd, dept.dept_cd, dept.dept_st, dept.dept_nm, dept.dept_tr, dept.dept_addr1, dept.dept_addr2, dept.dept_fg FROM sdept AS dept WHERE dept.dept_cd=#{dept_cd};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sdept ( co_cd, dept_cd, dept_st, dept_nm, dept_tr, dept_addr1, dept_addr2, dept_fg ) VALUES ( #{co_cd}, #{dept_cd}, #{dept_st}, #{dept_nm}, #{dept_tr}, #{dept_addr1}, #{dept_addr2}, #{dept_fg} )
